entry.title: TUESDAY DEADLINE FOR SPECIAL DISTRICT ELECTION
entry.summary: November 7, 2023 4:20 a.m. Tuesday is the deadline for voters to return their ballots in a special district election for the Oakland School District. entry.title: CCCU AWARDS OVER $30,000 IN CHALKBOARD GRANTS TO EDUCATORS
entry.summary: November 7, 2023 4:00 a.m. In the KQEN Business Spotlight: This fall, 104 educators in Douglas County have been selected to receive over $30,000 in grant money from Cascade Community Credit Union. Marketing Director Shelby Beattie said the funds will benefit 34 schools in the area, including public and private schools of all grade levels....
